meanings: (부사) actually, in fact, as a matter of fact, to be honest, to tell the truth
Adverb as a matter of fact, actually, in fact

examples.korean: It can be difficult to ascertain the facts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사실을 알아내기가 어려울 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: This story, it later transpired, was untrue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나중에 알고 보니 이 이야기는 사실이 아니었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This story, it later transpired, was untrue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The newspaper has unearthed some disturbing facts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 신문이 몇 가지 불편한 사실들을 밝혀냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The newspaper has unearthed some disturbing facts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was no escaping the fact that he was overweight. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 과체중이라는 사실은 피할 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was no escaping the fact that he was overweight. Add to Wordbook
